summary: The document is a segment from the JFK Assassination Records Collection, featuring an agent report that involves DOD-affiliated personnel. It includes a sworn statement by Henry D. Glaister, CPT, Field Artillery, concerning Joseph Timothy White, PFC, and outlines the procedure for releasing an Agent Report to Norval White Jr., Joseph's father. The document is unclassified but has been released with certain deletions.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK assassination investigations.
It pertains to investigations involving DOD-affiliated personnel.
Includes a sworn statement from Henry D. Glaister about Joseph Timothy White.
Describes the process for releasing an Agent Report to Norval White Jr.
The document is unclassified but contains deletions.
